topic.title: Subject Data Human Clinical Trials - conformance rules

section.p: This fundamental template contains the core document related information for reporting the experience of a human subject within a clinical trial.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:2)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:3)/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:4)
The code value identifies the document as a human clinical subject data report.

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:5), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality) (CONF:6)
Documents the confidentiality level of the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7)
The effective date for the contents of the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8)
The identifier assigned to the subject data report. It is needed to uniquely identify a particular report of subject data from a study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:9)
The language used for the document. The entry may be left out, if the language used is English.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] realmCode (CONF:10)
Identifies a country or other administrative unit that has defined particular rules for the format or content of the clinical document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setId (CONF:11)
An identifier that remains consistent across all revisions derived from a common original. In the first version of the document - VersonNumber = 1, setId and id will be identical.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] versionNumber (CONF:12)
A unique identifier for a version of a report.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf (CONF:13)
Identifies the study the subject data report is associated with.
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DOC" (CONF:18)
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:19)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLNTRL" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:20)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:23)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:21)
The code value indicates the related act refers to the study.
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:22)
The identifier of the study. [SDTM: STUDYID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] author (CONF:14)
A required CDA association - it identifies the person responsible for the content of the subject data report. It is true that the investigator is not the absolute source of all the content included within the subject data document, given that some of the information is derived by the sponsor. However, the subject data document is based on information collected, and therefore "authored" by the investigator. In the last analysis, the investigator is the primary source of the information.
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="AUT" (CONF:40)
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor (CONF:41)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:42)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:43)
An identifier for the investigator who is responsible for the document. [SDTM: INVID]
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:44)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:46)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:47)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:48)
The name of the investigator. [SDTM: INVNAM]
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedOrganization (CONF:45)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:50)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:51)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:49)
The only part of the address that is required is the country. This records the countery of the investigational site associated with the subject's participation in the study. [SDTM: COUNTRY]
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:52)
An identifier for the study site associated with this subject, and this investigator. [SDTM:SITID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:15)
A required CDA association - it identifies the organization that manages custody of the subject data report.
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST" (CONF:54)
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian (CONF:53)
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:55)
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization (CONF:56)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:57)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:58)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:59)
An identifier for the custodial organization - the study sponsor.
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:60)
The name of the custodial organization - the study sponsor.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget (CONF:16)
A required CDA association - it identifies the person which is the subject of the study data report.
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT" (CONF:24)
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole (CONF:25)
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PAT" (CONF:28)
This patientRole SHALL contain [2..2] id (CONF:29)
A set of identifiers for the study subject. These include the unique study ID ) which identifies the subject across all studies for a product, and a study specific ID which identifies the subject within the context of a single study. [SEND: USUBJID, SUBJID]
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient (CONF:30)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:31)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:32)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:33), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Sex C66731 STATIC (CONF:34)
[SEND: SEX]
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:35)
The date of the study subject's birth. [SEND: BRTHDTC]
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: The unique subject ID shall be present. [SDTM, USUBJID]. (CONF:26)
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: Shall include an identifer for the subject within the study. [SDTM, SUBJID]. (CONF:27)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:17)
Provides an association to the subject of the report.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Human Clinical Subject Data Document Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.13)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:2)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] realmCode (CONF:10)
Identifies a country or other administrative unit that has defined particular rules for the format or content of the clinical document.
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId with data type Infrastructure Root Type Id

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8)
The identifier assigned to the subject data report. It is needed to uniquely identify a particular report of subject data from a study.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:3)/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:4)
The code value identifies the document as a human clinical subject data report.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7)
The effective date for the contents of the document.

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode (CONF:5), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality) (CONF:6)
Documents the confidentiality level of the document.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode (CONF:9)
The language used for the document. The entry may be left out, if the language used is English.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setId (CONF:11)
An identifier that remains consistent across all revisions derived from a common original. In the first version of the document - VersonNumber = 1, setId and id will be identical.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] versionNumber (CONF:12)
A unique identifier for a version of a report.
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf (CONF:13)
Identifies the study the subject data report is associated with.
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DOC" (CONF:18)
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent (CONF:19)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLNTRL" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:20)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:23)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:21)
The code value indicates the related act refers to the study.
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:22)
The identifier of the study. [SDTM: STUDYID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] author (CONF:14)
A required CDA association - it identifies the person responsible for the content of the subject data report. It is true that the investigator is not the absolute source of all the content included within the subject data document, given that some of the information is derived by the sponsor. However, the subject data document is based on information collected, and therefore "authored" by the investigator. In the last analysis, the investigator is the primary source of the information.
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="AUT" (CONF:40)
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor (CONF:41)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:42)
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:43)
An identifier for the investigator who is responsible for the document. [SDTM: INVID]
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:44)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:46)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:47)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:48)
The name of the investigator. [SDTM: INVNAM]
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedOrganization (CONF:45)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:50)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:51)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:49)
The only part of the address that is required is the country. This records the countery of the investigational site associated with the subject's participation in the study. [SDTM: COUNTRY]
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:52)
An identifier for the study site associated with this subject, and this investigator. [SDTM:SITID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (CONF:15)
A required CDA association - it identifies the organization that manages custody of the subject data report.
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST" (CONF:54)
This custodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian (CONF:53)
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:55)
This assignedCustodian SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization (CONF:56)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:57)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:58)
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:59)
An identifier for the custodial organization - the study sponsor.
This representedCustodianOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:60)
The name of the custodial organization - the study sponsor.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget (CONF:16)
A required CDA association - it identifies the person which is the subject of the study data report.
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT" (CONF:24)
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole (CONF:25)
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PAT" (CONF:28)
This patientRole SHALL contain [2..2] id (CONF:29)
A set of identifiers for the study subject. These include the unique study ID ) which identifies the subject across all studies for a product, and a study specific ID which identifies the subject within the context of a single study. [SEND: USUBJID, SUBJID]
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient (CONF:30)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:31)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:32)
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:33), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Sex C66731 STATIC (CONF:34)
[SEND: SEX]
This patient MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:35)
The date of the study subject's birth. [SEND: BRTHDTC]
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: The unique subject ID shall be present. [SDTM, USUBJID]. (CONF:26)
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: Shall include an identifer for the subject within the study. [SDTM, SUBJID]. (CONF:27)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:17)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Human Clinical Subject Data Document Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.13)
Provides an association to the subject of the report.

row.entry: human Clinical Subject Data Document Section
human Clinical Subject Data Document Section
Human Clinical Subject Data Document Section

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <realmCode code="Code forrealmCode"/> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.11"/> <id root="1619651412" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="TBD" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.25" codeSystemName="Confidentiality"/> <languageCode code="Code forlanguageCode"/> <setId root="4540488d-0c8f-420d-890d-b5670f00b29a" extension="MDHT"/> <versionNumber value="1"/> <recordTarget typeCode="RCT"> <patientRole classCode="PAT"/> </recordTarget> <author typeCode="AUT"> <time/> <assignedAuthor classCode="ASSIGNED"/> </author> <custodian typeCode="CST"> <assignedCustodian classCode="ASSIGNED"/> </custodian> <documentationOf typeCode="DOC"> <serviceEvent classCode="CLNTRL" moodCode="EVN"/> </documentationOf> <component> <structuredBody> <component> <section classCode="DOCSECT" moodCode="EVN"> <realmCode code="Code forrealmCode"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.13"/> <id root="617005163" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="HUStbd" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <confidentialityCode code="1834911836"/> <languageCode code="Code forlanguageCode"/> <entry typeCode="COMP"/> <entry> <act/> </entry> <entry> <encounter classCode="ENC" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.100"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </encounter> </entry> <entry> <act> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.93"/> <code codeSystem="locally defined"/> </act> </entry> <entry> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.43"/> </act> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.52"/> <code code="MHItbd" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.71"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation/> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.92"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.85"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.86"/> <interpretationCode codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <methodCode codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <substanceAdministration classCode="SBADM"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.87"/> </substanceAdministration> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23"/> <code code="C49569" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.15"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" displayName="Adverse Event - Reported"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation/> </entry> <entry> <observation/> </entry> </section> </component> </structuredBody> </component> </ClinicalDocument>
